subject: Poker (Card Game)
World Series of Poker
lead_paragraph: The two-time World Series of Poker champion Johnny Chan was eliminated from the no-limit Texas Hold ’em main event Thursday in Las Vegas after gambling strong pocket pairs twice against pocket aces, the game’s best starting hand.
snippet: The two-time World Series of Poker champion Johnny Chan was eliminated from the no-limit Texas Hold ’em main event Thursday in Las Vegas after gambling strong pocket pairs twice against pocket aces, the game’s best starting hand.
